title: AI Vector Store Redis Configuration
description: Configuration schema for setting up an AI-powered vector store using Redis, including vector similarity parameters, Redis connection settings, and storage behavior.

properties.title: Vector Store Settings
properties.description: Defines the vector search behavior, similarity function, eviction strategy, and performance-related settings.

embeddingSize.title: Embedding Size
embeddingSize.description: Dimension of the embedding vectors. This must match the dimensionality used by the model generating embeddings.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of results returned in a vector search query.

similarity.title: Similarity Function
similarity.description: The distance metric used to compare embedding vectors. COSINE returns similarity between 0 and 1, DOT_PRODUCT is sensitive to vector magnitude, and EUCLIDEAN computes raw distance.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for a result to be considered relevant. For COSINE and DOT_PRODUCT, this ranges from 0 (least similar) to 1 (most similar). For EUCLIDEAN, lower is more similar.

indexType.title: Index type
indexType.description: Index type used for vector search.

readOnly.title: Allow Readonly
readOnly.description: If true, disables writes and enables read-only access to the index.

allowEviction.title: Allow Eviction
allowEviction.description: Enable automatic eviction of old or unused entries from the vector store when readOnly is false.

evictTime.title: Eviction Time
evictTime.description: Duration after which an unused vector entry can be evicted.

evictTimeUnit.title: Eviction Time Unit
evictTimeUnit.description: Unit of time used for eviction duration. Defines how long unused vectors are retained.

redisConfig.title: Redis Configuration
redisConfig.description: Connection settings and template behavior for accessing the Redis vector store.

url.title: Redis URL
url.description: Full Redis connection URI (e.g., redis://localhost:6379 or rediss://host:port for SSL).

username.title: Username
username.description: Optional Redis username for authentication when using ACL.

password.title: Password
password.description: Optional Password for authenticating with the Redis server.

index.title: Index name
index.description: Name of the RedisSearch index where vector documents are stored.

prefix.title: Key Prefix
prefix.description: Namespace prefix used to isolate vector keys and prevent collisions across applications.

query.title: Query Template
query.description: Redis search query template used to fetch KNN results, optionally with filtering. Supports placeholders like $vector, $max_results, $retrieval_context_key and $similarity_score

scoreField.title: Similarity Score field
scoreField.description: Name of the field used to sort results returned by the KNN query. Default is 'score'.

vectorStoreConfig.title: Redis Vector Store Configuration
vectorStoreConfig.description: Performance and storage tuning options for Redis vector store backend.

initialCapacity.title: Initial Capacity
initialCapacity.description: Number of vectors to allocate memory for on initialization. Helps optimize memory if known in advance.

blockSize.title: Block Size
blockSize.description: Number of additional vectors allocated when resizing internal memory structures.
